description: Create and manage chatbots with predefined responses, custom workflows, and integrations.
Access detailed usage statistics and performance metrics for your chatbots.
Integrate your chatbots into external platforms using API keys.
Apply custom branding to your chatbots by adding logos, colors, and personalized messages.
Receive assistance and resolve issues via multiple support channels.
Subscribe to newsletters for updates, promotions, and new features.
Deploy your chatbots across multiple platforms, including websites, social media, and messaging apps.
Gain access to a dedicated account manager for personalized assistance.
Leverage advanced Natural Language Processing (NLP) models for improved chatbot accuracy and understanding.
Design custom workflows and decision trees for your chatbots.
Manage user accounts and permissions within your organization.
Export chatbot interaction data for analysis or compliance purposes.
Enable seamless handoff from chatbots to live agents when complex issues arise.
Enhance security with features like two-factor authentication (2FA), IP whitelisting, and data encryption.
Integrate voice-based interactions into your chatbots.
